column4: in the cups web-interface - what credentials is it looking for? (Ubuntu 6.06)  I am trying to add a printer.
and I get a Username/Password prompt
so any ideas what credentials I need to use in the cups web interface?  I tried "root" and the sudo password
your password is the sudo password
check the paper size from the program you print from
also turn the printer off and back on
I filed a huge bug report on it, but for some reason it worked after I turned it off and back on.  Made no sense.
is this required every time?  or once per reboot?
I haven't had to do it since, but who knows.  I generally leave my printer on 24/7 so I hope not
I am just trying to get the test page to work
also did you update to the newest cups packages?  There was an update either today or yesterday
yes, I saw those - and yes I updated
no - the test page job is just sitting there - not printing
do you know how to file a bug report?
yes - but you would think basic printing should be working - perhaps I am doing something wrong
